mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(id) AS area_a, TRIM(name) AS area_a_name, create_dept AS create_dept FROM wh_fault_area WHERE type='A'
AND name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{area_a_name}),'%')
AND id = #{area_a}
ORDER BY area_a_name

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(id) AS area_b, TRIM(name) AS area_b_name FROM wh_fault_area WHERE type='B' AND pid = #{area_a}
AND id = #{area_b}

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(id) AS area_f, TRIM(name) AS area_f_name FROM wh_fault_area WHERE type='F' AND pid = #{area_b}
AND id = #{area_f}

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(id) AS area_r, TRIM(name) AS area_r_name FROM wh_fault_area WHERE type='R' AND pid = #{area_f}
AND id = #{area_r}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wh_fault( id, class_a, class_b, area_a, area_b, area_f, area_r, tel, remark, stat, repair_time, create_dept, create_date, update_date ) VALUES( #{id}, #{class_a}, #{class_b}, #{area_a}, #{area_b}, #{area_f}, #{area_r}, #{tel}, #{remark}, 'NEW', #{repair_time}, #{create_dept}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
